title: Suspicious PowerShell Activity on DC01
fullText:
Incident INC-1023

Summary:
EDR detected suspicious PowerShell command execution on DC01.

Details:
- Encoded PowerShell launched from Office macro.
- Network connections to rare external IPs.
- Mimikatz-like strings observed in memory.

Planned Actions:
- Isolate host.
- Collect memory image.
- Reset domain admin credentials if compromise confirmed.

title: Multiple Failed Logons from Rare Country
fullText:
SIEM use case 'Rare Country Logins' fired multiple times against user HR-USER-12.

Authentication attempts from IPs in a country not seen in the last 90 days.

User is normally office-based with no travel scheduled.

title: Possible Phishing Campaign via O365
fullText:
Email security gateway detected multiple inbound messages with suspicious links imitating MFA prompts.

Targets include finance and executive assistants.
Landing pages observed collecting O365 credentials.

Blocklist has been updated and retroactive search performed.
